oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1959-10-17 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from October 17, 1959. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Ray Price (host/performer), guest performers the Wilburn Brothers, and regular performers Archie Campbell, Tommy Jackson, the Jordanaires, Chet Atkins, June Carter, and Del Wood. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 1049th broadcast, though in fact it is likely the 1045th.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Ray Price; Archie Campbell; Wilburn Brothers; Tommy Jackson; Jimmie Selph; Jordanaires; Chet Atkins
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Ray Price -- Heartaches By The Number (Ray Price) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, Ray Price) -- Ray Price introduces Archie Campbell -- Comedy routine (Archie Campbell, Ray Price) -- Grant Turner and Ray Price introduce the Wilburn Brothers -- A Woman's Intuition (Wilburn Brothers) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Ray Price) -- Grant Turner introduces Tommy Jackson -- Bill Cheatham (Tommy Jackson fiddle, Jimmie Selph calls) -- Ray Price talks -- The Old Rugged Cross (Ray Price, Jordanaires) -- Grant Turner introduces Chet Atkins -- White Silver Sands (Chet Atkins)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Turner, Grant; Smathers, Ben, -1990; Stoney Mountain Cloggers; Campbell, Archie; Cash, June Carter, 1929-2003; Atkins, Chet; Wood, Del; Jackson, Tommy; Jordanaires (Musical group); Selph, Jimmy; Price, Ray, 1926-2013; Wilburn Brothers; Wilburn, Teddy; Wilburn, Doyle
